Strings for the home page</!--> Home Instructions: Treesapp is a game embedded within the grounds of the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. This is an exciting quest that combines the fun of walking around campus with a simple way of learning more about the interesting trees on campus. Players in the game of Treesapp must travel around the UIUC campus to find specific rewards located within certain trees on campus. Each item found will be a trinket worth collecting, as it will possess a value for players to sell or display; In order to collect the trinket, players must complete a certain task at the location on campus. GLHF!
